name: quickbase-mcp-server
description: A comprehensive Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for QuickBase integration with maximum flexibility. Supports all QuickBase operations including tables, fields, records, relationships, and reports.

scripts.test:smoke: node -e "import('./dist/tools/index.js').then(m => { if (!m || !Array.isArray(m.quickbaseTools) || m.quickbaseTools.length === 0) { console.error('Smoke test failed: quickbaseTools not found'); process.exit(1); } console.log('Smoke test OK: tools loaded:', m.quickbaseTools.length); }).catch(e => { console.error('Smoke test failed:', e?.message || e); process.exit(1); })"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm ci && npm run build && npm run test

author: Lawrence Cirillo
